scenarios.starting_prompt: I need to book a flight.
scenarios.conversation_plan: Search for flights from New York to Los Angeles on December 15th. Ask about the cheapest option. Book it for Jane Doe, jane@example.com.

scenarios.starting_prompt: Can you help me with travel?
scenarios.conversation_plan: Ask about flights to Chicago. Change your mind and ask about flights to Miami instead. Pick the afternoon flight.

scenarios.starting_prompt: I need to cancel my booking.
scenarios.conversation_plan: Provide confirmation number CONF-FL001-001 and ask to cancel. Confirm the cancellation.
